name: fix-your-grammar
description: Electron app that fixes your grammar

scripts.copy-assets: if not exist dist\renderer mkdir dist\renderer && copy src\renderer\index.html dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\styles.css dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\settings.html dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\settings.css dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\settings.js dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\icon.png dist\renderer\
scripts.copy-html: copy src\renderer\index.html dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\settings.html dist\renderer\
scripts.copy-css: copy src\renderer\styles.css dist\renderer\ && copy src\renderer\settings.css dist\renderer\
scripts.copy-all: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css
